tool.name: Garnett - get feature genes
tool.description: Obtain a list of genes used as features in classification model

param.name: classifier_object
param.label: classifier object
param.help: Path to the object of class garnett_classifier, which is either trained via garnett_train_classifier.R or obtained elsewhere

param.name: node
param.label: node
param.help: In case a hierarchical marker tree was used to train the classifier, specify which node features should be shown. Default is 'root'. For other nodes, use the corresponding parent cell type name

param.name: database
param.label: gene database
param.help: argument for Bioconductor AnnotationDb-class package used for converting gene IDs

param.name: convert_ids
param.label: convert gene IDs
param.help: Boolean that indicates whether the gene IDs should be converted into SYMBOL notation
